留言內容: This is a very pretty shirt. It is soft and it feels like it may be polyester. I do love the fact that it has a lining inside of it which hides your under clothing. But it is much too big. I ordered it in a XL and it just hung way too low. My cleavage was very noticeable and it made me feel really uncomfortable. If I had of ordered a size down, I’m sure I would have loved it!

商品名稱: 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖襯衫鈕扣襯衫連衣裙雪紡寬鬆荷葉邊上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: A_黑色花朵
留言內容: Vine Customer Review of Free ProductI got this polyester chiffon blouse in black with muted flowers in shades of grey, rose, taupe, and mauve. The sheer sleeves do not have a shoulder seam; they are a raglan style which means the sleeves extend to the neckline and attach to the body of the shirt with diagonal seams that go from the armpit upward to the neck. (Baseball shirts have raglan sleeves) The reason I mention this, is because the lining is only in the body of the blouse, not in the sleeves; bra straps will be visible when wearing a bra with this blouse. The sheer sleeves come to my wrists and have an elastic closure approximately 3” from the end of each sleeve. This area with the elastic is very loose and doesn’t touch my wrists at all. I can push the sleeves above my elbows before the elastic actually touches skin.The blouse buttons up the front with fabric covered buttons (nice touch) and tiny  black elastic loops that are almost impossible to manipulate around each button. I have arthritis and have never had such a problem with buttons!  I’d recommend buttoning this blouse before you put it on. I may actually sew it closed.  The lining of this blouse is polyester with a small amount of spandex which makes it very comfortable when wearing. It also makes the putting on and taking off process easier, especially when you don’t ever want to unbutton those buttons as long as you live!As I was looking for the laundering instructions I realized they included an extra covered button stitched to that tag. (nice touch)Laundering instructions: Machine or hand wash at or below 40*C ( 104*F), Do not use bleach, Do not tumble dry, Cool iron, Do not dry clean.I have machine washed my blouse in cool water on a gentle cycle and then hung it up to dry and it looks great with almost no wrinkles.I recommend this blouse as long as you understand the issues with the buttons.

商品名稱: 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖襯衫鈕扣襯衫連衣裙雪紡寬鬆荷葉邊上衣
留言內容: It fits a little funny around the chest area, it doesn't close all the way for me and has that gap kind of thing. I think I should have sized up. For context, I have a very small back and wear a 30E in bras.

商品名稱: 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖襯衫鈕扣襯衫連衣裙雪紡寬鬆荷葉邊上衣
留言內容: I love this floral chiffon Blouse that I've worn to the office to work several times. The elastic button closures are a nice touch as well. This is lightweight but runs a bit large!

商品名稱: 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖襯衫鈕扣襯衫連衣裙雪紡寬鬆荷葉邊上衣
留言內容: Very delicate frilly top.  The sleeves are sheer and the body of the shirt is lined with a white panel.  The top is flattering and looks great with jeans, slacks or a skirt.  Nice addition to any wardrobe!

商品名稱: 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖襯衫鈕扣襯衫連衣裙雪紡寬鬆荷葉邊上衣
留言內容: Happily surprised with how nice this is.  Fits perfectly according to size chart.  Really nice, feminine style.  Outer layer is sheer and it has an opaque bodice underneath.  Quality on point.  Highly recommend.

商品名稱: 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖襯衫鈕扣襯衫連衣裙雪紡寬鬆荷葉邊上衣
留言內容: This blouse is  lined in the body and has unlined sheer sleeves. The background is a dark brown with some subtle streaks and an abundance of scattered flowers that are a mix of shades of beige and dark cantaloupe. (I think it was advertised as black with orange flowers but the add no longer has this option so I can't check.) To me this is an autumn to spring blouse but I wouldn't wear this color in summer.I'm  5'3" and about 135 lbs. and got the Medium. It fit ok around my chest (might need to wear a minimizer) and fit nicely by my hips; the elastic around the wrists did not constrict but could be used to push up the sleeves if you want. The material is super-light weight. I washed it in the sink and put it on a hanger to dry to see how suitable it would be for travel. There were a few wrinkles but they were mostly hidden due to the pattern so I give it high priority for packing. This blouse will look terrific for business or leisure, alone or with a blazer, vest or a thin shirt underneath if extra warmth is needed.There are 13 covered buttons; from the bottom up 10 of them have a strip of material backing while the top 3 don't have that strip, so if you want a V-neck there's no extra material showing. If you want to close the top three buttons there is a slightly awkward but livable pull to the gathered material. While the covered buttons is a nice touch, there are no button holes, rather there is a piece of elastic you pull over the button. I've never had a garment with an elastic closure that didn't eventually break so I plan to leave most of the buttons closed. As a nice touch - there is a spare button sewn onto the laundry care tag towards the bottom. 5 stars

商品名稱: 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖襯衫鈕扣襯衫連衣裙雪紡寬鬆荷葉邊上衣
留言內容: I received this product through the Amazon Vine program and was immediately struck by the high-quality appearance of this button-down shirt. It exudes a sense of craftsmanship and attention to detail. One feature that particularly stands out is what I like to call the "privacy flap," which runs from the breast area downward. This ingenious addition ensures that the shirt remains appropriately closed during movement, avoiding any awkward gaping moments.The design of the buttons is another thoughtful touch. Instead of traditional stiff loops, each button is secured with an elastic loop, greatly simplifying the fastening process. This is a considerate design choice, especially for individuals dealing with arthritis or limited hand mobility, making the shirt not only stylish but also accessible.The sheer arms of the shirt are a great detail, offering coverage without the bulk, making it an ideal choice for warmer climates. This feature gracefully conceals my arms while avoiding heavy materials, striking the perfect balance between comfort and elegance.The shirt's overall design is a modern twist on a classic, making it a standout piece for 2024. The placement of the buttons, particularly in the V-neck area, achieves a sophisticated look that is both conservative and subtly sexy. This button-down shirt truly combines style, functionality, and thoughtful design, making it a remarkable addition to any wardrobe.

無法載入媒體。
                



I’m 5’0 159lbs and ordered a medium. This blouse fit well but was slightly tight around the breast and lower stomach area. I’m a 36DD and have a mom pouch. The breast area wasn’t bad but the bottom part I didn’t button all the way and had to tuck in so it wouldn’t look awkward.The buttons! Let’s talk about the buttons. They’re pretty hard to get on and off and it takes some time which is an inconvenience. I was able to take it on and off having only the top few and bottom few unbuttoned atleast- the less you have to do the better.  It’s a little hair tie like string that wraps around the button and it’s just really time consuming and feels like you’re going to pull the buttons off so you have to be gentle.The good news is that behind the buttons they extended some fabric so you could technically get away with wearing it without a tank top underneath, but I still suggest it. It is only see through on the arms, the chest and back have a black inner lining.The top is very cute and looks like you care about your appearance. The material is nice but is a little scratchy in the arm area, not too bad though. Overall I really like it. One more thing is that I wish it accentuated my form a little bit more but the design is beautiful.
